io.github.izdwuut.yarl.controllers

Class GameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.izdwuut.yarl.controllers.Controller
      • io.github.izdwuut.yarl.controllers.GameController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.ashley.signals.Listener<Event>

    public class GameController
extends Controller
implements com.badlogic.ashley.signals.Listener<Event>
    Main controller. Handles input applicable to GameScreen, which is used to display map and message log.
    Since:
    2017-11-18
    Author:
    Bartosz "izdwuut" Konikiewicz

      GameController(com.badlogic.ashley.core.Engine engine, com.badlogic.gdx.Game game)

    • Field Detail

      • player

        Creature player
        A player entity.

      • screen

        GameScreen screen
        A screen that is used by YARL to render stuff. GameController is only responsible for constructing it.

      • initSys

        InitSystem initSys
        An initialization system.

      • worldSys

        WorldSystem worldSys
        A world system.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameController

        public GameController(com.badlogic.ashley.core.Engine engine,
                      com.badlogic.gdx.Game game)
        Takes as parameters YARL object (used in init method to set current screen) and an Ashley Engine. When parameters are assigned to appropriate fields, an init method is invoked to perform further actions needed to build the GameController.
        Parameters:
        game - a main game object
        engine - an Ashley engine

    • Method Detail

      • init

        void init()
        Further actions needed to be done to build a GameController. An InitSystem has to not be used outside constructors.

      • handleInput

        public void handleInput()
        Specifies controls and assigns them to actions.
